thread.section_title: Compare Travel Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Compare Travel Insurance | comparetravelinsurance.com.au
thread.title: Megan
thread.title_full: Compare Travel Insurance reviewed by Megan

author: Megan
title: Megan
text: comparetravelinsurance.com.au may not have the big advertising budgets of other comparison websites but they have something else instead - a way to compare travel insurance policies based on the value of the car rental excess. I can't believe the two competitor sites I visited don't have this feature! I also appreciated that I didn't need to provide my contact information in order to use the service. Obviously each comparison website has a different set of brands it refers to, but even after looking at the websites of about 10 other insurers I still found the best option for me on comparetravelinsurance.com.au . Would definitely use again!
